001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.authentication;
002
003import java.util.Set;
004import lombok.AllArgsConstructor;
005import lombok.Getter;
006import org.openqa.selenium.Cookie;
007
008/**
009 * Represents session information for a logged-in user.
010 *
011 * <p>This class stores authentication-related data, including browser cookies and
012 * local storage content, to enable session restoration without requiring re-login.
013 * It is primarily used in {@link BaseLoginClient} for caching and restoring user sessions.
014 *
015 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
016 */
017@AllArgsConstructor
018@Getter
019public class SessionInfo {
020
021   /**
022    * The set of cookies associated with the authenticated session.
023    */
024   private Set<Cookie> cookies;
025
026   /**
027    * The JSON representation of local storage data associated with the session.
028    */
029   private String localStorage;
030
031}
